title: Sample Book Of Woven Ribbons, 1893–98
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: jacquard woven plain weave, chine, moire, rep
description: Sample book has 94 ribbon samples with stripes in various colors: 288 checks, 243 samples in plain cloth, moiré, chiné, and rep; 92 with fancy woven border; 11 with short fringes; 100 with jaquard weaves; 2 woven labels; 3 small flags.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book Of Woven Ribbons, 1893–98.Medium: silk
Technique: jacquard woven plain weave, chine, moire, rep. 1945-19-2.
